title: I am Joe's heart. - Rev. ed.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education

description: Uses animation and live action to show the effects of lack of exercise, heavy smoking, and overindulgence in fatty foods and alcohol on the heart. Shows how the heart and circulatory system function and stresses exercise and healthful living.
